DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine tolerability Cetaphil® DermaControl™ Foam Wash Moisturizer SPF 30 pediatric subject ( 7-11 ) acne prone skin .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability Foaming Facial Cleanser Moisturizer SPF 30 Pediatric Population ( 7-11 ) With Acne Prone Skin .
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , single center study conduct United States evaluate tolerability Cetaphil® DermaControl™ skin care product use least daily 22 day male female subject age 7 11 acne prone skin . There 4 visit course study : screening ( within 7 day visit 1 ) , visit 1 ( baseline /day1 ) , visit 2 ( day 8 ) , visit 3 ( day 22/exit ) . Tolerability assessment perform board certify dermatologist visit . Subjects complete baseline skin care regimen questionnaire visit 1 . Hydration assessment compete visit 1 , 2 , 3 . A subject satisfaction questionnaire complete visit 3 . Adverse event assessment conduct subject every clinic visit inform consent/assent sign .
